StoryText: At the arcade with my family and I have an extra token that my brother and my sister both want.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Give the token to some other young kid in the arcade to use
Decide to keep it myself and use it for a game

OptionResult.Result: My sister gets mad at me and storms off, my brother is ecstatic and he wins a bunch of tickets that he shares with me.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Of course my sister gets mad because I chose my brother but I think it was the right choice because he won big and we got a ton of tickets! Oh, the prizes I can choose now!

OptionResult.Result: My sister is so happy to play another game but my brother gets so mad that he and I get in a fight.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Of course my brother gets mad because I choose my sister but he went too far and we end up getting into a fight right in the middle of the arcade! Kind of embarrassing...

OptionResult.Result: Everyone agrees that this was a nice thing to do and we all get food together, however, I have an allergic reaction to something I eat.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: We all felt good giving the token to another kid there to let him enjoy some more games and I would have felt really great had I not had an awful allergic reaction to the food we then ate!

OptionResult.Result: My sister gets angry with me but my brother actually finds this hilarious and roots me on while I play my game.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I’m glad I just kept the token for myself, I wasn’t done playing and my brother rooted me on. I just wish my sister wouldn’t have gotten so mad at me.
